meanings: (몹시, 심하게) violently, severely, badly, wildly, blindly

examples.korean: He jigged up and down with excitement. 발음듣기 그가 신이 나서 마구 촐랑댔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He jigged up and down with excitement. 발음

examples.korean: The house rocked when the bomb exploded. 발음듣기 그 폭탄이 터졌을 때 집은 마구 뒤흔들렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The house rocked when the bomb exploded. 발음

examples.korean: The town was rocked by an earthquake. 발음듣기 그 도시는 지진으로 마구 뒤흔들렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The town was rocked by an earthquake. 발음

examples.korean: The children had smeared mud on the walls. 발음듣기 아이들이 벽에 진흙을 마구 처발라 놓은 상태였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The children had smeared mud on the walls. 발음

examples.korean: She thrashed her head from side to side. 발음듣기 그녀가 고개를 좌우로 마구 흔들었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She thrashed her head from side to side. 발음
